content.question: Which of the following must be true for the code segment to compile without error?

choices.label: The generatePasscode method should be designated as void.
The generatePasscode method should be designated as static.
The AccountManager class should contain another method with the name generatePasscode that has at least one parameter.
The AccountManager class should contain another method with the name generatePasscode that has return type double.

content.answer: The generatePasscode method should be designated as static.

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
